result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.
result.ga: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.orig: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.html: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an ḃliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
